name: The Ship (Handic)
overview: A text adventure game as in the Commodore Adventure series. This is the second adventure in a trilogy. Where the first one is called "The Mutant Spiders" and third on is named "The Fourth Sarcophagus". The Ship is an adventure. In this adventure you have to save someone very dear from danger. Yourself. You're brain is the only tool that can find the way to control this ghost-ship. Lady Luck and Sir Good Fortune has joined hands with the evil forces to stop you. You only have one thing to help you out-your infinite comprehension. Knowledge is bliss. How did you end up on board of this Ship? You come home to your Commodore 64, by chance you insert The Ship diskette... A mysterious man appears behind you - what time period is he from he looks partly like black-beard and partly like a man would want you to land in Havana... He strikes you on the head OH! my mind goes blank...
